ValidationRule.description: Reviewed by,Reviewed Date,Exception Outcome,Rejection Reason can only be edited by an Imp Supervisor
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')),
OR (NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,'Imp Supervisor'))), OR (NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,'Imp Specialist'))), OR (NOT(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,'MPSC NBCER'))),
OR( AND(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Reviewed_By__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(Reviewed_By__c))), AND(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Reviewed_Date__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(Reviewed_Date__c))), AND(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Exception_Outcome__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Exception_Outcome__c)))),
AND(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Rejection_Reason__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(Rejection_Reason__c)))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reviewed by,Reviewed Date,Exception Outcome,Rejection Reason can only be edited by an Imp Supervisor
